wpex:error-messages.feature-not-availabl: This feature is not available from the client. Please use the equivalent server command instead.
wpex:error-messages.mod-not-installed-on: Waypoint Extensions is not installed on the Server. Please ask your server administrator to install the Waypoint Extensions on the server, for added functionality.
wpex:error-messages.feature-disabled: The server administrator has disabled this feature.
